channel.title: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i238.photobucket.com/albums/ff11/silent19831/INTROO.png[/img][/center]
Hello everyone, welcome to the Porchie PK development thread, on here you will be able to find the latest updates and progress I've made on the server. This isn't a server that is going to be like all the other 2005/2006 remakes that everyone is trying to make. Instead, I've decided to implement many ways for players to interact and have fun with each other in a fun way. The server is about 40 percent of the way done, and I'm working my hardest to try and complete the server ASAP.
Porchie PK is a unique runescape experience for players, which allows for players to interact, level, and PK with each other in a fun environment. The server's leveling system is based off of runescape dungeoneering system, however I've implemented a few changes into it.
[center][size=24pt][color=green][b][u]UPDATES LIST[/center]
[size=16pt]August 13th[/size] - Started Development Log
[u]Dungeon Updates[/u]
- Added start of dungeon outside of Lumbridge - Added first five rooms to the dungeon - Added NPC's to the first five rooms in the dungeon - Added doors to the dungeon rooms - Edited npc drops to make npcs drop the required keys for the next area - Made npcs walk around freely throughout their area - Made working doors throughout the dungeon for houses - Added banks to each room in the dungeon - Fixed damage that "WATCHMAN" and "GUARD" do (Used to just hit 0s)
[u]Shop Updates[/u]
- Added shops to the start of dungeon (Bronze, Iron, Steel Shop "Weapons & Armor") - Added shop to the fourth room (Black, Mithril "Weapons & Armor" - Added general store npc to each room in the dungeon - Added Skill shop to home (Sells items required to skill, such as fishing gear, seeds, vials, etc..) - Added Ranged and Magic store to the beginning of dungeon (Weapons & Armor) - Added another Ranged and Magic store in the fourth room (Weapons & Armor) - Added food into the general shop
[u]Minigame Updates[/u]
- Finished Bandos FFA - Added REINFORCEMENTS into Team PK - 1/2 Way done TEAM BOSS Minigame - Added Team PKP store - Added Bandos FFA store
[u]General Updates[/u]
- Reduced EXP RATES to 30* what the player hits (Hard to get max combat level in a day) - Added in Spirit shields and Elite armor - Set requirements for Elite armor - Elite armor requires 80 Strength - Elite armor requires 80 Attack - Elite armor requires 1 Defense - Elite armor requires 70 Prayer - Reduced skilling rates to give players a challenge
[size=16pt][color=red]August 14th[/size]
[u]Dungeon Updates[/u]
- Added another 4 rooms to the dungeon - Added working doors with key requirements to EVERY room - Edited NPC drops to drop keys at a lowered rate (5 percent drop rate) - Added freely walking NPC's to the new rooms - Added Mystery box to drop list for npc's over level 80 (1 Percent drop rate, gives you a random item) - Added misc. item drops to every NPC added currently - Added multi-combat into every area - Added banks into the four new rooms - Added skilling spots to the rooms in dungeon - Skilling spots include fishing areas, mining rocks, thieving stalls, etc. - Made doors work in the new 4 dungeon area's
[u]Shop Updates[/u]
- Adjusted shop prices to allow for a good economy - Added Adamantite and Runite stores to the 7th room (Weapons & Armor) - Added general stores into the added four rooms - Added PK Point store ( Can't buy ridiculous items )
[u]General Updates[/u]
- Fixed magic skills so they all work now - Disabled tele grab - Switched teleports around so they now give you options of where to tele to - Added fun PK - Added Yanille PK - Protect Item now works - Added working pickpocketing to all npcs
[size=16pt][color=red]August 15th[/size] [u]Dungeon Updates[/u]
- Added 2 new rooms to the dungeon - Added Boss room - Added doors with key requirements to the rooms - Added individual cells to boss room with working keys required - Fixed npc attacking animations on hill giants, guards, and some others - Fixed hp on many npc's inside the dungeon - Added in token drop system to NPC drops
[u]Shop Updates[/u]
- Added in Ranged and magic stores to the 7th room (Green d-hide, rune x-bows, magic shortbows, mystic robes, etc..) - Added Token shop to home and Varrock - Added food into the general stores in area's corresponding to player levels. (Shrimp and anchovies in the first two areas, better food after and so fourth..)
[u]General Updates[/u]
- Adjusted correct skill rates for thieving, fishing, herblore, farming, etc.. - Added to npc drop lists (Including bosses) - Added options to remaining teleport skills - Made so more doors and gates work correctly - Implemented 60% buyback of items real price to GENERAL STORES (Sell items to the real stores if you want the right amount of cash back, if you're in a hurry you won't get the same price back) - Fixed dragon bow - Added in some new items, including korasi, chaotic rapier, chaotic maul, chaotic cross bow, chaotic longsword, divine spirit shields - Implemented a new system of making spirit shields into blessed spirit shields/sigil blessed shields
[size=16pt][color=red]August 16th[/size] [u]Dungeon Updates[/u]
- Added 4 new rooms to the dungeon - Added both ice cave entrances with corresponding teleports into ice cave entrances - Finished boss cells (8 atm) - Finished the ice cave (Will post some screenshots tomorrow hopefully) - Added wilderness to all the pk dungeon areas - Took token shop out of varrock as I have a new idea for varrock O.o - Fixed npc damage - Fixed boss damage and health (Some have 2000.. good luck guys)
[u]Shop Updates[/u]
- Added secret stores in certain dungeon rooms (Team capes, gems, some other stuffs) - Added items to the token store (Post screenshots tomorrow)
[u]General Updates[/u]
- Added and deleted alot of global objects - Fixed D-claw spec - Fixed dds spec - Added in DFS, with requirements - Lowered requirements on bandos armor so pures only need 40 defense to wear instead of 65
[size=16pt][color=red]August 20th[/size] 4 Days worth of updates, was too busy to edit the post :( [u]Dungeon Updates[/u]
- Added MANY new rooms to the dungeon - Added NPC's into the ice caves, along with mini-bosses - Finished boss cave with corresponding keys and drops finished also - Updated damage and emotes on every npc inside the dungeon - Added misc items, along with keys to npc drops - Added the "Master's City" - Added Barrows into the dungeon - Fixed npc movement - Added new fishing and skilling area's into the dungeon - Created "The Cavern" with three entrances - Added fully working npc's to the cavern - Completed more pk area's inside the dungeon - Much more minor stuff
[u]Shop Updates[/u]
- Added general stores to every other dungeon room past level 5 - Added new Dungeon based shops - Added NPC's to "Master's City" - Other minor changes (Shops are almost done)
[u]General Updates[/u]
- Deleted alot of tree's - Fixed D-claw model - Fixed the distance at which NPC's will stop following player's - Fixed the distance at which players will attack other NPC's (running to them) - Added more dungeon area's to the Master's City area - Patched up some doors, and fully opened up lumbridge castle so now upstairs also works - Added many new teleports into the magic tab (New menu's) - Other minor changes
I've also began working on the "Varrock Lockout" Minigame, which will be similar to that of fight pits. Players will enter Varrock's waiting room for the game from either of the four entrances to varrock, all of which are accessible VIA the dungeon. This makes so players must be atleast level 60+ or so to take part in the game. There is also a teleport going to the waiting room, however you need the corresponding key to be able to use it. When the minigame starts, players will be teleported to the middle of Varrock, from there they will be able to reposition themselves accordingly to what is going on. Player's will then have to fight 8 waves of monster's together, varying in difficulty. At the end of the fifth wave, player's inventories are replenished with cooked sharks, as nobody will be able to keep a fully stocked inventory the whole minigame. The 8 waves of monsters are of varying difficulty, and players must work together to defeat the monsters. Players will all be rewarded points for each monster killed, and will recieve a bonus for every round they complete. They can then spend these points at the corresponding shop, which can be found in the four waiting rooms, at home, or at the Master's City.
[size=16pt][color=red]August 25th[/size]
- Changed the thread around a bit, updated pictures etc..
[u]Dungeon Updates[/u]
- Finished The Cavern ( Added wildy, respawns, etc.. ) - Finished The Sand Lair - Added extra's to boss room - Finished the PK area leading all the way around varrock - Includes npcs - Includes drops - Includes working animations - Includes correct damage - Includes shops - Includes skilling areas - Added Dungeon room's outside the Master's City (NPCS have 450 hp each ATLEAST) - Added working animations to those NPCS ^ - Began working on the dungeon area number to pop up on your screen for the corresponding rooms (1-50) - Much more minor stuff
[u]Shop Updates[/u]
- Added general stores to new rooms - Added new Dungeon based shops - Added NPC's to dungeon area's throughout the Master's City dungeon - Other minor changes (prices, buy x amount, etc)
[u]General Updates[/u]
- Began work on Varrock Lockdown as well as Zombies - Fixed npc and attack distance - Fixed teleports completely - Fixed doors and ladders in lumbridge - Added new custom pk areas with clickable rewards (raises stats for 5 pk points.. therefore str is raised by 15 til you die if you pay 5 pk points) - Started work on new interface tab similar to quest menu for the blank spot
[size=16pt][color=red]September 1st[/size]
- Added video(s) [u]Dungeon Updates[/u]
- Finished Lumbridge dungeon interfaces - Did alot of updates to new dungeon - Added new skilling areas to all new rooms - Added alot of other minor stuff you'll see in video/pictures
[u]Shop Updates[/u]
- Added general stores to new rooms - Added NPC's to dungeon area's throughout the Master's City dungeon - Other minor changes
[u]General Updates[/u]
- VARROCK LOCKDOWN ALMOST COMPLETED :D - Updated some of the commands - Made new jail area - Began work on PK Interfaces - Began work on risk for reward system (PK) - Other stuffs
UPDATES LIST will be edited everyday when i add something new to the server. New media will also be added daily, so keep an eye out for progression on this server.
[left][size=16pt][color=green]Minigames[/size][/left]
TEAM PK
- Blue and Red team portals are located in lumbridge castle - Cannot be wearing a cape when going into the area - Armor and other items will not be lost inside (similar to fun PK) - Food and potion vendors at spawn of each team (blue and red) - Bank at home sides - Safe area for both sides with players inside known as REINFORCEMENTS - REINFORCEMENTS are teleported into the playing area when the timer reaches 0 (Reinforcements timer...10 seconds) - Players on the same team cannot attack each other - Max of 25 players on each team - Working waiting room with player count, game time, wait time - Working team pk point system for rewards - Capes are given based on which portal players click on and must be worn to enter - Cannot unequip cape inside of TEAM PK area - Teleported out if you log out during a game - 12 Games will run each day.. (1 every 2 hours)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JFNtuATodC0
____________________________________________________________________________________________________
Bandos FFA
- Portal is located on the right side of lumbridge castle - Players cannot wear any equipment when entering - Upon entrance, players are equipped with bandos tasset, chestplate, 3rd age helmet, bandos boots, BGS and are given full inventory of food on death. - Supports up to 40 players - Players are teleported to a waiting area, where the game runs 6 times a day - Players respawn in random positions around the FFA area (its a secret room.. Giant circle) - Awared BANDOS FFA points for kills and extra for top 5 which can be used at a store for bandos gear - Upon exit, all the gear and food that you have equipped will be deleted - Gear cannot be taken off inside or dropped - Other items cannot be brought into the area ___________________________________________________________________________________________________
TEAM BOSS Minigame
- Runs (4) times a day - Portal is by Lumbridge fountain - Players can wear whatever gear they like, and will not lose it on death - Bank before every boss - Games run for 30 minutes - Maximum of 40 Players - When teleported in, players will spawn in a waiting room - When waiting time = 0 the players will be teleported to the game room - The bosses located in this room are in a sequence, where players must run forwards to find the bosses and battle them one at a time - Multicombat is obviously enabled - Bosses have 6500 + HP, however do not hit exceptionally high damage - After a boss is killed, this creates a new checkpoint in which the players will respawn at if they die (New checkpoint is in between bosses to allow for a faster return trip to bosses) - When bosses are killed, all players that are inside the area and have done damage to the boss will recieve X amount of Boss Points - Boss Points are based on the difficulty of the boss killed - These boss points can be used to purchase custom items and also custom potions for PK (Similar to extreme attack/strength/defense potions) - Players also have a 5% chance to recieve a mystery box when a boss is killed
More minigames will be added shortly, as I am currently working on implementing a ZOMBIES minigame, where players are teleported into a cave, two of whom will be ZOMBIES, with dragon claws, and full zombie armor. Other players will be normal players, however will be equipped with a AGS to defend themselves against the evil undead. When players are killed by zombies, they will become infected and equipped with a pair of d claws, and full zombie armor. They will then spawn in the zombies lair, and begin their hunt to infect their old team-mates. The minigame should be implemented within the next week.
Varrock Lockdown! Almost finished, need to add npc's and death method.
- Located at varrock, accessible via the lumbridge dungeon - Similar to fight pits, rewarding good amounts of tokens - Team friendly - Goes on throughout the whole day, only 10 minute timers in between each game - Awards tokens per each npc kill (Misc (1-100) based on npc level) - Awards total kills x 5 tokens at the end of the game (250 total kills x 5 = 1250 bonus tokens!) - 20 Waves of fighting! - 1 Boss wave (Chance to drop rares) - The minigame requires players to run all around varrock, as spawns will spawn in new locations every 5 waves.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FKcipNH-5nQ
[center][IMG]http://i238.photobucket.com/albums/ff11/silent19831/media.png[/img][/center]

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________
Any support or constructive criticism you guys give is greatly appreciated, as I know your opinions can help me to make my server a better place to play.
I'll try to keep the topic updated as often as I can, however double posting isn't allowed, so it's up to you guys to keep this topic active and alive ^^.
Thanks
- Porchie

item.title: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

I have a pretty interesting idea for you. Instead of teamPK teleports etc, you need to get the key access to the area and so on which you have already done, there could be teleports to these areas in certain dungeons. Such as an harder dungeon could have a well teleport or something to take you to godwars, or an easier dungeon could teleport you to teamPK so that you don’t get to play the minigames until you are some-what of an higher level.

Read full topic

I’m adding multi-barrage to the Varrock Lockdown minigame, as well as for all other multicombat areas, sorry for not updating in the past few days, when I try uploading to youtube it lags my whole houses’ internet, so I need to shorten video’s somehow… I’ll post a update for today in an hour, I’ve also managed to get some developers on board for this project now ^^

Offtopic : School starts tomorrow, coding may slow down a bit :[[/quote]

kk, send me client via pm and I can rec for u?

item.title: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“porchie, post:43, topic:410325”][quote author=judostar1 link=topic=511608.msg3736473#msg3736473 date=1315001155]

You know what, i’ve begun to like this, maybe you can add the giant mole as a boss in one of the boss rooms?

I’ve already got it I’ve also made so that godwars is incorporated into the boss dungeon
Godwars is like this though

  • Teleport into room with NPC’s lvl 108
  • When KC (Killcouint) is 10, you can enter next room with corresponding boss (Through the door/gate)

Also working on adding corp beast, but I’ve not really got around to the dungeon to much in the past day or so, working on the lockdown minigame :D… Uploading videos right now actually…

Level 108 npcs? Kewl, but there is the real god wars bosses right?

You should also add corp as like the 5th last boss for your dung, 4th last would be zammy, 3rd sara, 2nd bandos, and the most pain in the ass one, armadyl.

If you have kq as a boss already then your project is coming along, if the kq changes form after dying then I can’t wait!
[/quote]

Corp, as well as the godwars bosses have been assigned a seperate chamber with 5 doors/gates the first of which leads to corp, the other 4 lead to godwars rooms & bosses. The bosses are all real god wars bosses, and I’ll try to get a video of that dungeon uploaded tonight…

KQ has 2 forms! It was actually really easy to do T_T…

I’m uploading new video’s on to youtube right now of Varrock Lockdown, I’ve managed to make it to wave 10 with two people! haha (multilogged of course)[/quote]

Bahaha sweet.

Read full topic
item.source: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!

item.title: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!
item.dc:creator: @porchie porchie
item.description:
@porchie wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:42, topic:410325”][quote author=porchie link=topic=511608.msg3735786#msg3735786 date=1314937680]

You know what, i’ve begun to like this, maybe you can add the giant mole as a boss in one of the boss rooms?

I’ve already got it I’ve also made so that godwars is incorporated into the boss dungeon
Godwars is like this though

  • Teleport into room with NPC’s lvl 108
  • When KC (Killcouint) is 10, you can enter next room with corresponding boss (Through the door/gate)

Also working on adding corp beast, but I’ve not really got around to the dungeon to much in the past day or so, working on the lockdown minigame :D… Uploading videos right now actually…
[/quote]

Level 108 npcs? Kewl, but there is the real god wars bosses right?

You should also add corp as like the 5th last boss for your dung, 4th last would be zammy, 3rd sara, 2nd bandos, and the most pain in the ass one, armadyl.

If you have kq as a boss already then your project is coming along, if the kq changes form after dying then I can’t wait![/quote]

Corp, as well as the godwars bosses have been assigned a seperate chamber with 5 doors/gates the first of which leads to corp, the other 4 lead to godwars rooms & bosses. The bosses are all real god wars bosses, and I’ll try to get a video of that dungeon uploaded tonight…

KQ has 2 forms! It was actually really easy to do T_T…

I’m uploading new video’s on to youtube right now of Varrock Lockdown, I’ve managed to make it to wave 10 with two people! haha (multilogged of course)

Read full topic

item.source: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!

item.title: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!
item.dc:creator: @porchie porchie
item.description:
@porchie wrote:

I’ve already fixed the bug with being able to no-clip on startup, similar to how you do it. When you log into my server, a screen will pop up saying how many tokens you have in your bank, total tokens you have earned, total npc kills, and some other little bits of info about the server, as well as the updates.

I’ve yet to actually clip every object I’ve put in, partly because I can’t find a overall NPC clipping tutorial for delta, I know it has to do with worldmap 2 co-ords, however I can’t figure out how to get them to work? All a new experience for me, however I’m going to do my best to completely fix clipping. The following no-clip is going to be hardest to fix I believe, however I have a few good idea’s of what to do to get around allowing players to follow through the doors.

I’ve also posted a topic in the development team section now! So if you’re interested in lending me a hand on the server, please post over there ^^ I’m uploading some new videos to youtube now, most of which are just overviews of the dungeon area (Me running through them)

As for your post mendorphins, regarding the Varrock Lockdown minigame. I didn’t get to do even half of it on the youtube video, and I’ve made some changes to it already ^^ Some info on the minigame that might clear up the concerns you had:

  • After round 5, NPC waves begin spawning in different area’s around varrock, therefore players will have to actually move
  • Working on a SHUTDOWN Lever, which will clear the current wave (Only able to use it once per game)
  • There’s 20 waves (Including a boss wave)

Will try to update the topic in a bit, thanks for all the feedback guys!

  • Porchie

Read full topic
item.source: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!

item.title: Porchie PK - A new way of leveling and pking -- New Videos!
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:35, topic:410325”]what r gona do about the no-clipping??

cuz if u log out and in and click rly fast, u walk to it.
thats the same how ppl ruined my dungeoneering on my server =/

( cuz costums objects have a very very very very small lagg with spawning)

but i just made that when u log in u have to press a button “click here to play”
like that oldschool runescape interface that shows how many unreaded messages u have

worked for me[/quote]
Maybe load the clipping before the clicking, so to speak. Everything is initiated in order. Top to bottom.

Read full topic

what r gona do about the no-clipping??

cuz if u log out and in and click rly fast, u walk to it.
thats the same how ppl ruined my dungeoneering on my server =/

( cuz costums objects have a very very very very small lagg with spawning)

but i just made that when u log in u have to press a button “click here to play”
like that oldschool runescape interface that shows how many unreaded messages u have

worked for me
